entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
